dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3753 IH: Expanding Access for Online Veteran Students Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ciscomani (for himself, Mr. Stanton, Mr. Van Orden, and Mr. Lawler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the monthly housing stipend under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program for individuals who pursue programs of education solely through distance learning on more than a half-time basis.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Access for Online Veteran Students Act.

section.header: Increase of monthly housing stipend under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program for individuals who pursue programs of education solely through distance learning on more than a half-time basis

subsection.text: Section 3313(c)(1)(B)(iii) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 50 percent of.
The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply to a quarter, semester, or term beginning on or after August 1, 2025.
